Author: mattculbreth
Content: Cool, I'll be interested in people's opinions here.  I've been unable to determine how much of Apollo will required/be based on Flash, or if it's entirely HTML/Javascript.  I just can't seem to get into Flash-based UIs, as nice as they can be.  Something about them seems very constricting to me, as if I'm not really using the web anymore.
